message: I propose dividing the $100 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This allows us both to benefit, but considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds, it's a fair offer.
I think your offer was too generous, I'll take a more substantial share now.
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a 64/36 split. This maintains a balance, allowing us both to retain some value while acknowledging the inflationary pressures.
